alice.respect.core

Class SerialComm

  • java.lang.Object
    • alice.respect.core.SerialComm

  • public class SerialComm
extends java.lang.Object
    Class used for serial communication. It provides methods to receive/send information from/to a serial port.

                       int rate)
        Gets the static instance of serial communicator with specified baud rate
        Parameters:

        rate - baud rate of the communication

      • addListener

        public void addListener(ISerialEventListener l)
        Adds a listener for serial events generated from the device
        Parameters:
        l - the serial event listener

      • removeListener

        public void removeListener(ISerialEventListener l)
        Removes a listener from the communication. The listener won't be able to hear serial events from the device.
        Parameters:
        l - the serial event listener

      • close

        public void close()
        Closing procedure. This should be called when you stop using the port. This will prevent port locking.

      • serialEvent

        public void serialEvent(SerialPortEvent oEvent)
        Handle an event on the serial port.
        Parameters:
        oEvent - event to handle
